channel.title: CVE Feed for Chart Builder Team -- Chartify
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Chart Builder Team -- Chartify

item.title: CVE-2024-47347|2024-10-06T10:29:32.119Z -- chart%20builder%20team -- chartify
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation (XSS or 'Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Chart Builder Team Chartify allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Chartify: from n/a through 2.7.6.
